title: Front-end Developer (Middle Level - Senior )
description:
-	Design, developing new programs, products, or features by analyzing the raw requirement.
-	Collaborating with the back-end developers and other team members to establish objectives and design more functional, cohesive codes to enhance the user experience.
-	Taking lead on projects, as needed.
requirements:
-	Bachelor’s degree in computer programming, computer science, or a related field.
-	Proficient understanding of web markup, including HTML5, CSS3
-	Proficient server-side CSS pre-processing platforms, such as LESS and SASS
-	Proficient understanding of client-side scripting and JavaScript frameworks, including jQuery
-	Proficient understanding of AngularJS
-	Proficient understanding of asynchronous request handling, partial page updates, and AJAX
-	Proficient understanding of cross browser compatibility issues and ways to work around them.
-	Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git
-	Strong problem solving.
-	Good communication in English
